Source code for src.controllers.whatif_field

"""File to handle what if field controller"""
from ..models import Models, create, delete, update

what_if_field = Models.WhatIfField



[docs]def get_all_what_if_fields() -> what_if_field.Model:
    """
    Get all what if fields
    Returns:
        what_if_field.Model: what_if_field.Model
    """
    return what_if_field.Model.query.all()




[docs]def get_what_if_field_by_id(_id: int) -> what_if_field.Model:
    """
    Get what if field by id
    Args:
        _id (int): id of what if field
    Returns:
        what_if_field.Model: what_if_field.Model
    """
    return what_if_field.Model.query.get(_id)




[docs]def get_what_if_field_by_scenario_id(scenario_id: int) -> what_if_field.Model:
    """
    Get what if field by scenario id
    Args:
        scenario_id (int): id of scenario
    Returns:
        what_if_field.Model: what_if_field.Model
    """
    return what_if_field.Model.query.filter_by(scenario_id=scenario_id).all()




[docs]async def post_what_if_field(data: dict) -> what_if_field.Model or None:
    """
    Post what if field
    Args:
        data (dict): data to work with
    Returns:
        what_if_field.Model: what_if_field.Model
    """
    new_what_if_field = what_if_field.Model(data)
    response, new_what_if_field = await create(new_what_if_field, "WhatIfField")
    if response:
        return new_what_if_field
    return None




[docs]async def update_what_if_field(_id: int, data: dict) -> what_if_field.Model or None:
    """
    Update what if field
    Args:
        _id (int): id of what if field
        data (dict): data to work with
    Returns:
        what_if_field.Model: what_if_field.Model
    """
    what_if_field_to_update = what_if_field.Model.query.get(_id)
    if what_if_field_to_update:
        for key, value in data.items():
            setattr(what_if_field_to_update, key, value)
        response, what_if_field_to_update = await update(
            what_if_field_to_update, "WhatIfField"
        )
        if response:
            return what_if_field_to_update
    return None




[docs]async def delete_what_if_field(_id: int) -> bool:
    """
    Delete what if field
    Args:
        _id (int): id of what if field
    Returns:
        bool: True or False
    """
    what_if_field_to_delete = what_if_field.Model.query.get(_id)
    if what_if_field_to_delete:
        return await delete(what_if_field_to_delete, "WhatIfField")
    return False
